reviews.text: I like the food so much. it's a 45 mins drive for me
terrible customer service,  small portions of food GOOO elsewhere
This restaurant never has food..they're always telling you to come back.
One of the best Haitian restaurants. I had a birthday party for my mom they caterer the food, my whole family loved it.

Original taste of Haitian food back home.
The legumes is a must try.
The corn meal with beans tastes great.
Rice and beans is really good.
Only $12 you can have your belly full.
The service was good and the food is great, amazing. I had the legume and rice & peas delicious ðŸ¤¤

This was my first time ever trying Haitian food and I must say the standards were met. I did not know what to eat , but the woman at the counter was able to help by offering suggestions. The food was very fresh and the place was clean. I am giving this establishment 5 stars, very good for the community.

GREAT Haitian Food, if you order Griot ask them to not put any chewy pieces, you know those pieces of Griot that feel like Rubber? yea avoid those just ask for the good pieces of griot. This place has Great Food & I Hope it stays open for awhile.
I want to give this spot a 5 star sooo bad but the (pork )griot was too hard n need a little bit more flavor to it!! The price wasn't bad either for a large...
Food was good and the place very clean.
